short_summary: Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for Body Repair and Paint Services for DND Bagotville, Qc
description: Bids are invited for the Provision of Body Repair and Paint Services for the potential use by DND Bagotville, Qc. The Offeror must provide the specified Services, as outlined in Annex A of the Request for Standing Offers, without prior notice to the Crown. All Offers shall be valid for a period of 1 year from the date of the Contract Award.
duration_in_months: For standing Offer contracts: If the Crown does not exercise its option, the Contract will automatically terminate after one year
tags: Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
W0138-23A085 - Request for Standing Offers for Body Repair and Paint Services
==========================================================================

**Government Tender Notice**
-----------------------------

**Reference Number (Numéro de référence):**
WS4359347010-Doc4359360133
**Publication Date (Date de publication):**
April 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date (Date limite pour l'appel d'offres):**
May 21, 2024, 2:00 PM (EDT)
**Amendment Date (Date de modification):**
May 13, 2024

**Procurement Details**
------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for Body Repair and Paint Services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at Bagotville, Quebec.

**Procurement Category (Catégorie d’approvisionnement):**
Service Contract (Contrat de service)
**Notice Type (Type d’avis):**
Request for Standing Offers (Demande d’offre à commandes)
**Procurement Method (Méthode d’approvisionnement):**
Competitive bidding (Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
**Selection Criteria (Critères de sélection):**
Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux):**
This RFSO is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- ... and several others (see below)

**Region of Operation (Région d’opération):**
Saguenay
**Region of Delivery (Région de livraison):**
Saguenay

**Contracting Entity (Entité contractante):**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Contact Information (Informations de contact):**
Julie Carbonneau (SPAC/PSPC)
 julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL (URL de l’avis):**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19456949?extsite=MTk0NTY5NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
